column4: alright the error log file is still saying the error "could not open default font 'fixed'"
uh, is this really a problem?
it's also saying "error opening security policy file /etc/X11/xserver/SecurityPolicy"
how can i see the mounted devices in terminal mode?
you can check your /media folder, also /etc/fstab is a useful file to look at
supposedly, ubuntu should do it autmoatically
x or no x, yes :)
try man mount
but check if it's mounted first
cd /media
hmm, look at /etc/fstab
it may give you some hints
/etc/fstab just says command not found
that's a file, do nane /etc/fstab
nane: command not found
nane: command not found
did I write nane? I meant nano
I've been pretty busy :)
sorry, I'm just to used to it Just Works
sounds like it's broken :|
the usb hdd? it isn't broken
